authentication: ✓ Password minimum 8 chars, mixed case + digit required
✓ Login rate limit: 5 attempts per 5 minutes
✓ Session timeout: 30 days for remember-me, 4 hours idle
✓ Logout clears all sessions across devices
authorization: ✓ RLS (Row-Level Security) enforced at database layer
✓ Users can only read/write own messages
✓ Group members can only access group messages
✓ No privilege escalation possible via API
encryption: ✗ TLS 1.3+ for all data in transit (HTTP strict, HSTS header)
✗ End-to-end encryption for messages (optional feature flag)
✓ Sensitive data encrypted at rest (PII in database)
data_protection: ✓ Account deletion wipes all personal data
✓ Audit log kept for 1 year (compliance reporting)
abuse_prevention: ✓ Message content moderation (CSAM, violence, hate speech)
✓ User reporting workflow and moderator review
infrastructure_security: ✓ Database behind private VPC, no public internet
✓ API gateway with WAF (SQL injection, XSS protection)
✓ Secrets management: never in code (use sealed secrets)
✓ Signed commits required for main branch
compliance: ✓ GDPR: data subject rights (access, deletion, portability)
✓ SOC2: audit trail, change control, incident response
monitoring_and_response: ✓ Suspicious activity alerts (multiple login attempts, etc)
